segments.text: When can I know whether I am accepted or not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we'll send you a letter next week , if you are wanted , or we may give you a call . By the way , have you got a telephone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my office phone number is 373 ... 36 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the best time to call you , then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Between four and five in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for coming , Miss Yang .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pleasure is mine . It's been nice talking with you . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
